cast.overview: After barely surviving a brutal attack by a sadistic serial killer, crime boss Jang Dong-su is left humiliated. Determined to catch the killer known as K, he forms an uneasy alliance with Jung Tae-seok, a relentless and incorruptible detective who often disrupts his illegal business. However, while Jang Dong-su wants K dead, Jung Tae-suk is determined to bring him to justice. With a deal in place—whoever finds K first will decide his fate—the hunt begins, blurring the lines between crime and law.
cast.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil

details.biography: Heo Dong Won is a South Korean actor. He was born on June 9, 1980 and made his acting debut in 2014. Since then, he has appeared in a variety of films and television dramas, including “Sell Your Haunted House” (2021).
details.name: Heo Dong-won
